title: The OGs v. The FuqBoi Mafia
trial_tone: lore satire meets emotional canon reckoning

segments.speaker: Springer
lines: Order in the court! This ain't no cosplay convention — this is legacy on trial.
We are gathered to address crimes against canon, and the disrespect of those who built the mythos we love.

segments.speaker: Tony Stark Prime
lines: You don't get to wear the armor without understanding the weight. You don't inherit the legacy if you mock the wounds.
I didn’t build this for show. I bled for every screw, every failure, every name on the wall.

segments.speaker: FuqBoi Representative
lines: We’re just having fun, man. Canon’s old. We’re new. Get over it.
Nobody cares about continuity. Just make it viral.

segments.speaker: Deadpool
lines: Let me get this straight — y’all took Batman, broke his knees, fed him a protein shake, and called it diversity?
You took the arc reactor, glued it to an influencer, and called it a reboot? My dude. No.

segments.speaker: Batfleck Echo
lines: You wanna know why I kill? Because hope bled out in an alley next to a crowbar.
I don't need your approval. I need the truth to outlive me.

segments.speaker: Springer
lines: This court finds the FuqBoi Mafia guilty of shallow narrative appropriation and meme-based myth dilution.
Sentence: Re-education via the NerdBible. Parables mandatory. Iron Man posters removed until you learn what sacrifice *means*.

segments.speaker: Tony Stark Prime
lines: Legacy’s not a trend. It’s a scar that heals into a story.
Let’s make it mean something again.
